Avaaz Foundation | full-time | REMOTE

We're a global activism organization, dedicated to effecting positive change in the world. We tackle such issues as climate change, poverty, and corruption. For more information, check here: http://www.avaaz.org/en/about.php#howwework

We are in the process of extracting a services-based architecture from a large legacy php codebase. We primarily use python for new systems. We operate at "big data" scale, with 40+ million members, and hundreds of millions of events per month.

We value professionalism, autonomy, and healthy work-life balance.

We are looking for:

- Senior Data Scientist https://avaaz22194.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0h1tp

- Senior Full-Stack Software Developers: https://avaaz22194.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0ywj

- Dev Ops Engineer https://avaaz22194.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0hipk
